{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07473v1", "title": "Standard $t$-structures", "summary": "We provide a general construction of induced $t$-structures, that generalizes
standard $t$-structures for $\infty$-categories of sheaves. More precisely,
given a presentable $\infty$-category $\mathcal{X}$ and a presentable stable
$\infty$-category $\mathcal{E}$ equipped with an accessible $t$-structure $\tau
= (\mathcal{E}_{\geq 0}, \mathcal{E}_{\leq 0})$, we show that $\mathcal{X}
\otimes \mathcal{E}$ is equipped with a canonical $t$-structure whose
coconnective part is given in $\mathcal{X} \otimes \mathcal{E}_{\leq 0}$. When
$\mathcal{X}$ is an $\infty$-topos, we give a more explicit description of the
connective part as well.", "main_category": "math.CT", "categories": "math.CT,math.AT", "published": "2025-04-10T05:55:43Z"}
